entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
